titleStmt.title: To the Right Hounourable the supreame authority of the Common-wealth of England in Parliament assembled. The humble petition of divers free-holders and other inhabitants in the county of Hartford.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Brewster, at the three Bibles at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Praying that the Good Old Cause may be maintained, tithes abolished and the laws revised.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the three Bibles at the west end of Pauls
